paragraph.paragraph:
The support cluster contains many classes providing useful facilities within the library. Many of the classes within this cluster are constant classes, which are filled with constant values for specific contexts, generally indicated by their names. The following constant classes are available within this cluster:
EV_DIALOG_CONSTANTS
EV_DRAWABLE_CONSTANTS
EV_FONT_CONSTANTS
EV_KEY_CONSTANTS
EV_POSTSCRIPT_PAGE_CONSTANTS In a similar vein to constant classes, the two following classes are provided to provide support for default EV_COLOR's and EV_PIXMAP's.
EV_STOCK_COLORS
EV_STOCK_PIXMAPS Click
/libraries/vision2/reference/interface/support/index.html here to browse the support cluster.
